The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\ndiam\\OneDrive\\Bureau\\5dev.serviceRawFile:
service: auth-service
frameworkVersion: '4'

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: eu-west-3
  httpApi:
    cors:
      allowedOrigins:
        - "*"
      allowedHeaders:
        - "*"
      allowedMethods:
        - "*"

functions:
  signup:
    handler: handler.signup
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /auth/signup
          method: POST

  confirm:
    handler: handler.confirm
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /auth/confirm
          method: POST

  login:
    handler: handler.login
    events:
      - httpApi:
          path: /auth/login
          method: POST
